price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka sε: “Montwεn, na menso meka mo ne wͻn a wͻretwεn no ho“.
arabic: قُلۡ تَرَبَّصُواْ فَإِنِّي مَعَكُم مِّنَ ٱلۡمُتَرَبِّصِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul tarabbaṣū fa-innī maʿakum mina al-mutarabiṣīna
